item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Universe 2019
item.description: Uji Time Dessert After giving my talk, “Don’t be a Robot; automating workflows at scale” at GitHub Universe, I decided to spend some time exploring Japantown in San Francisco, and stumbled upon this place. It is so unique so I decided to get my ice cream there. Check out Uji Time Dessert for their matcha ice cream and taiyaki cones! 🍦😝🤳 Matcha ice cream with taiyaki cone and red bean topping 🤤

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon DE 2019
item.description: Hokey Pokey Lucie recommended this place, and we met up and get to chat and catch up. Check out Eispatisserie Hokey Pokey in Berlin! A special #IceCreamSelfie with @Patjouk #PyConDE 🍦😝🤳 pic.twitter.com/SFoQy6JI1x — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) October 13, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Zapier Fall Retreat 2019
item.description: Wonders Ice Cream During Zapier’s Retreat, I gave a quick ignite talk about public speaking. Afterwards, with a few other Zapiens, we went to Wonders Ice Cream for Rolled Ice Cream. Unfortunately, I learned that this place has since closed down 😔 View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyBay 2019
item.description: The Baked Bear The Baked Bear is known for their ice cream sandwiches! 🍦😝🤳 #IceCreamSelfie #PyBay2019 pic.twitter.com/GE6icRnLW6 — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) August 19, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2019
item.description: Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches PyCon US 2019 was a busy one for me. I gave a talk, a tutorial, and also ran the first Mentored Sprints with Nina Zakharenko and Tania Allard, AND co-chaired the Python Language Summit for the first time 😵 (I ended up co-charing it for 4 years). I went to Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches. The ice cream sandwich was really yummy! 😋 I’m sad to hear that this place has since closed down.
